info.title: Decrement a slider by one star in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSliderAndSetValueToOne

user: With focus on the 'Rating' slider, set its value to zero stars.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Rating' slider, set its value to zero stars.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.
